tool.name: tools
tool.command:
parsec tools upload_file "$path" "$history_id"
#if $dbkey: --dbkey "$dbkey" #end if #if $file_name: --file_name "$file_name" #end if #if $file_type: --file_type "$file_type" #end if #if $space_to_tab: $space_to_tab #end if #if $to_posix_lines: $to_posix_lines #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: path
param.label: Path
param.help: path of the file to upload

param.name: history_id
param.label: History Id
param.help: id of the history where to upload the file

param.name: file_name
param.label: File Name
param.help: (optional) name of the new history dataset

param.name: file_type
param.label: File Type
param.help: Galaxy datatype for the new dataset, default is auto

param.name: space_to_tab
param.label: Space To Tab
param.help: whether to convert spaces to tabs. Default is False. Applicable only if to_posix_lines is True

param.name: to_posix_lines
param.label: To Posix Lines
param.help: if True, convert universal line endings to POSIX line endings. Default is True. Set to False if you upload a gzip, bz2 or zip archive containing a binary file

tool.help: Upload the file specified by ``path`` to the history specified by ``history_id``.
